ValidationRule.description: If pcpmhtrain_c = ‘Yes’, the user must fill in pcpmhtraindesc_c to detail that training. This validation fires only if the current time is greater than or equal to Bypass_Validations_Timeout__c.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Bypass_Validations_Timeout__c <= NOW(), ISPICKVAL(pcpmhtrain__c, 'Yes'), ISBLANK(pcpmhtraindesc__c), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Provider' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please describe the previous mental health training if Specialty Mental Health Training is ‘Yes’.
